description: This file defines multiple AI agents with various tools and configurations, sets up a playground environment for testing these agents, and includes class definitions for movie scripts. It serves as a central script for initializing and running a demo AI playground.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a movie script with setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: playground.get_app
methods.description: Method to retrieve the FastAPI app instance from the Playground object.

methods.name: playground.serve
methods.description: Method to serve the FastAPI app, with reload enabled for development.
